union
select upper(CUST_EMAIL) as CUST_EMAIL,CUST_CREDIT_LIMIT,CUST_INCOME_LEVEL,CUST_MAIN_PHONE_NUMBER,COUNTRY_ID,CUST_STATE_PROVINCE_ID,CUST_STATE_PROVINCE,CUST_CITY_ID,CUST_CITY,CUST_POSTAL_CODE,CUST_STREET_ADDRESS,CUST_MARITAL_STATUS,CUST_YEAR_OF_BIRTH,CUST_GENDER,CUST_LAST_NAME,CUST_FIRST_NAME,CUST_ID,CUST_VALID,CUST_EFF_TO,CUST_EFF_FROM,CUST_SRC_ID,CUST_TOTAL_ID,CUST_TOTAL from SH.CUSTOMERS where cust_id between 101 and 1000
union
